context.text: List of Puisne Justices of the Supreme Court of Canada - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
The judges are listed in order of appointment to the Court, and thus did not necessarily replace the judge immediately preceding them in the list.
List of Puisne Justices of the Supreme Court of Canada

The following judges have served as Puisne Justices of the Supreme Court of Canada . Judges whose departure date is in bold did not leave the court on that date, but became Chief Justice of the Court.
[ edit ] Justice appointments by prime minister
[ edit ] Justice appointments by prime minister
List of Puisne Justices of the Supreme Court of Canada
List of Chief Justices of the Supreme Court of Canada List of Justices of the Supreme Court of Canada
